snippets.name: Mandamus Filing
snippets.html:
I drafted and filed federal complaint for writ of mandamus/APA delay re: the application.

{key:tab}

Drafted and filed federal complaint for writ of mandamus/APA delay re: the application.

snippets.name: Habeas Petition
snippets.html:
I prepared and filed habeas petition challenging unlawful detention of the client.

{key:tab}

Prepared and filed habeas petition challenging unlawful detention of the client.

snippets.name: Federal Case Update
snippets.html:
I communicated with AUSA/DOJ about pending litigation in the case.

{key:tab}

Communicated with AUSA/DOJ about pending litigation in the case.

snippets.name: Mandamus Complaint Drafted
snippets.html:
I drafted a federal complaint seeking mandamus relief.

{key:tab}

I outlined jurisdiction, cause of action, and requested relief due to agency delay.

snippets.name: Mandamus Complaint Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a mandamus complaint in federal court.

{key:tab}

I confirmed service requirements and tracked initial deadlines.

snippets.name: Habeas Petition Drafted
snippets.html:
I drafted a habeas corpus petition challenging detention.

{key:tab}

I set out custody facts, legal grounds, and requested relief.

snippets.name: Habeas Petition Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a habeas corpus petition in federal court.

{key:tab}

I saved filed copies, noted deadlines, and prepared next steps.

snippets.name: Preliminary Injunction Motion Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a motion for a preliminary injunction.

{key:tab}

I identified irreparable harm, likelihood of success, and balance of equities in the motion.

snippets.name: Stay Request Filed in Federal Court
snippets.html:
I filed a motion or request for a stay in federal court.

{key:tab}

I explained the legal basis and immediate necessity for interim relief.

snippets.name: Joint Stipulation Prepared
snippets.html:
I prepared a joint stipulation with government counsel.

{key:tab}

I coordinated language and documented agreed terms and schedules.

snippets.name: Federal Case Status Call
snippets.html:
I spoke with government counsel regarding the status of a federal case.

{key:tab}

I discussed scheduling, briefing, and case resolution options.
